attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With petrol now costing in excess of £1 a litre I petition the government to reduce the amount of taxation on petrol, with the majority of that pound going to the treasury.

The will reduce the burden of cost on industry and the public and increase investment into this country as a result.

The savings on this could be found via a number of ways, less spent on foreign conflicts, debts collected from foreign countries and not written off, taxin fatty or unhealthy foods, etc.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
